mapper.insert: INSERT INTO L_OP_USE_MENU ( OCCUR_DT, OPRTR_ID, GRP_ID, MENU_ID, BTTN_CD, LGN_IP, COND ) VALUES ( NOW(), #{oprtrId}, #{grpId}, #{menuId}, #{bttnCd}, #{lgnIp}, #{cond} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM L_OP_USE_MENU LOUM WHERE 1=1
AND MENU_ID = #{menuId}
AND LOUM.OCCUR_DT >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')
AND LOUM.OCCUR_DT <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')

SELECT TO_CHAR(LOUM.OCCUR_DT, 'HH24') AS hours, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM L_OP_USE_MENU LOUM WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId} AND LOUM.OCCUR_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{strDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') GROUP BY hours ORDER BY hours ASC
